All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
DeleteFilmController
The DeleteFilmController class handles requests to delete a film object from the database based on a provided ID
Film
The Film class is a blueprint to create film objects.
FilmDAOEnum
The FilmDAOEnum class is the data access object that provides an interface to the films table in MySQL database.
InsertFilmController
The InsertFilmController class handles requests to insert a new film into the database
RetrieveFilmsController
The RetrieveFilmsController class handles requests to get all film instances stored in the database
SearchFilmController
The SearchFilmController class handles requests to search for specific films by title, year or director.
UpdateFilmController
The UpdateFilmController class handles requests to update an existing film in the database.
